original_text: Sons were born to Shaharaim in Moab after he had divorced his wives Hushim and Baara.
korean_text: 사하라임은 두 아내 후심과 바아라를 내 보낸 후에 모압 땅에서 자녀를 낳았으니

sentences.original_text: Sons were born to Shaharaim in Moab
after he had divorced his wives Hushim and Baara
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 아내 후심과 바아라를 이혼시킨 후에
